name: Parallax by Gradient
tagline: Host LLMs across devices sharing GPU to make your AI go brrr
description: Your local AI just leveled up to multiplayer. Parallax is the easiest way to build your own AI cluster to run the best large language models across devices, no matter their specs or location.

name: Well Intelligence
tagline: When startups Financial data meets business intelligence
description: Well gathers your financial data automatically, transforms it into clean, dependable records, and gives you tools to analyze, reconcile, and orchestrate with confidence.

name: Animation Builder by Unicorns Club
tagline: Turn a boring LinkedIn post into a fun TikTok-style video
description: Celebrate your startup wins with zero design effort ðŸŽ‰ The FREE Animation Builder by Unicorns Club turns boring LinkedIn posts into fun, TikTok-style highlight videos â€” made for founders, makers, and community updates.

name: Pomelli by Google Labs
tagline: Your copilot for on-brand content at any scale
description: Introducing Pomelli, the latest experiment from Google Labs. An AI marketing tool that helps you easily generate scalable, on-brand content to connect with your audience faster. Just enter your website, and Pomelli will understand your unique business identity to build effective campaigns tailored to your brand.

name: Command Center
tagline: Understand, review, and refactor your code 20x faster
description: Command Center is the fastest code-review and refactoring agent that lets any engineer turn good code into great code 20x faster.

name: Mistral AI Studio
tagline: The Production AI Platform
description: Create AI use cases, manage the full lifecycle, and ship with confidence, all with enterprise privacy, security, and full ownership of your data.

name: Lucent Chat
tagline: Create stunning videos by chatting with the best AI models
description: Create mind-blowing videos and visuals by speaking to AI. Lucent Chat unifies every AI model into one workspace, optimizes prompts, and helps creators and marketers ideate, generate and iterate blazingly fast.

name: Hot100.ai
tagline: The weekly AI project chart judged by AI
description: The weekly chart for AI-powered projects â€” judged by Flambo. Discover standout apps built with Cursor, Bolt, v0, Replit, Lovable, Claude Code and more... Flambo scores every submission based on innovation and utility New rankings every Monday.

name: Spiral
tagline: The AI writing partner with taste
description: An AI writing partner that captures your voice through collaborative interviews, generates multiple draft options simultaneously, and applies battle-tested writing principlesâ€”so your content sounds like you, not a model.

name: GitHub Mission Control
tagline: Assign, steer, and track copilot coding agent tasks
description: GitHub Mission Control is a unified command center that follows you wherever you work. Itâ€™s not a single destination; itâ€™s a consistent interface across GitHub, VS Code, mobile, and the CLI that lets you direct, monitor, and manage every AI-driven task. With mission control, you can choose from a fleet of agents, assign them work in parallel, and track their progress from any device.

name: Zumie
tagline: Screen recordings made beautiful
description: Create stunning screen recordings with automatic zoom, beautiful backgrounds and clean transitions. No editing skills required.

name: GoMask.ai
tagline: Instant compliant test data for engineering teams
description: Test data bottlenecks kill velocity. Teams wait days for data refreshes or secretly use production. GoMask delivers instant, compliant test data through schema-aware masking and AI synthesis. Minutes, not days. Compliance built-in, not bolted on.

name: LaunchForge
tagline: AI launches your product: page, posts, PH draft all in one
description: LaunchForge empowers indie makers and solopreneurs to ship products faster. Our AI instantly generates a compelling landing page, a full social media launch kit, and even a Product Hunt draft. Stop wasting time on launch prep; focus on building.

name: Quartr AI chat
tagline: All investor relations material in one powerful AI chat.
description: The Quartr mobile app lets you ask anything across all events and documents from public companies and instantly find the information you need. Every data point in all IR material, just one question away. Anytime, anywhere.

name: SocialKit
tagline: Social Media Videos to Data API
description: A simple API that lets you extract video summaries, transcripts, comments, and engagement metrics from YouTube, Shorts, TikTok, and more.

name: Dreamflow Mobile Preview
tagline: Preview and share live app updates across any device
description: Scan a QR code to preview your Dreamflow app instantly on real devices. Every change updates live, letting you and your team test layouts, gestures, and animations together. See your app as users will and move faster in flow.

name: ChetakAI
tagline: One workspace where AI, code, and teams work together
description: Too many tools. Lost context. Your AI doesnâ€™t know your code. ChetakAI is the workspace where AI, code, and teams finally click â€” built for teams and devs to build, collaborate, and ship faster together.

name: SAST
tagline: Stop running commands one by one yourself
description: Tired of running scattered scripts one by one to set up a project or complete routine tasks, manually adjusting paths and parameters every single time? This is the solution you've been waiting for.

name: GoMarble AI
tagline: AI Agent for instant ad insights and creative analyses
description: AI Agent for paid media teams that explains what changed, why, and what to do next. Ask questions like 'Why did my CAC increase?' and get root cause analysis, recommendations AND beautiful reports in seconds. Connects with Meta Ads, Google Ads, GA4, Shopify.

name: VoiSistant
tagline: AI-powered speech to text, tts, & translation Mac app
description: Turn your speech into polished text or instant translation, enhanced by your favorite LLM. One-tap AI grammar/style fix, natural voice playback with Microsoft TTS, and auto-paste anywhere â€” all from Mac menubar, private by design. Fast, local and cloud-ready.
